issue.title: Extent tooltip text field in backend
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier In the backend, when editing tooltip helps for any class or attribute ("aide contextuelle" in frecnh), the size of the field is rather small. It does not allow to type a long text in an easy way, especially if ones would like to add simple HTML anchors like
, or A multiline field was added for Joomla! 1.5 (see #501) A better enhancement (but incompatible with J! 1.5) would be to add some simple features for text formatting like below : !mootools-MooEditable-simple.PNG! (example with MooEditable, done with Mootools -> http://cheeaun.github.com/mooeditable/) Questions from Bruno to be addressed before doing it : * How do you plan to implement loading new Mootools API version and MooEditable API; there is a global way in EasySDI V2 of adding multiple Javascript API with a common loader and it would be nice to use such mecanism, if there isn't any some problem with such logical. Can you tell us more about that? * Joomla 2.5 integrates Mootools 1.4 so such functionality will be normally available with EasySDI V3; is it correct? We should not forget to remove Mootools 1.3 version in EasySDI V3; can you please add such issues affected to CATALOG V3? Can you please confirm that such new feature will be applied only to edition tooltip * Is there no way using any Joomla editor (tinyMCE, JCE, ...) for such feature?

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Irrelevant in Joomla 3.x as we should not inject HTML in tooltips
